languages.text: {n}Стракс водружает перед вами свой щит, отстегивает панцирь и ровно складывает поверх него, оставшись в форменном комбинезоне. Без брони он выглядит меньше и очень устало.{/n} "Маршал Грегорас Стракс официально сложил полномочия. Я более недостоин носить этот доспех. Пусть следующий его владелец не посрамит Лекс".

{n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."
languages.original_text: {n}Стракс водружает перед вами свой щит, отстегивает панцирь и ровно складывает поверх него, оставшись в форменном комбинезоне. Без брони он выглядит меньше и очень устало.{/n} "Маршал Грегорас Стракс официально сложил полномочия. Я более недостоин носить этот доспех. Пусть следующий его владелец не посрамит Лекс".

languages.text: {n}Strachs stellt seinen Schild ab, schlüpft aus seinem Harnisch und legt diesen auf den Schild. Ohne seine Rüstung wirkt er deutlich kleiner und ausgesprochen müde.{/n} "Ich, Marschall Gregoras Strachs trete von meinem Posten zurück. Ich bin dieser Rüstung nicht länger würdig. Möge ihr neuer Träger dem Lex zur Ehre gereichen."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

{n}Strachs stellt seinen Schild ab, schlüpft aus seinem Harnisch und legt diesen auf den Schild. Ohne seine Rüstung wirkt er deutlich kleiner und ausgesprochen müde.{/n} "Marschall Gregoras Strachs tritt von seinem Posten zurück. Ich bin dieser Rüstung nicht länger würdig. Möge ihr neuer Träger dem Lex zur Ehre gereichen."

languages.text: {n}Strachs pose son bouclier au sol, puis retire sa cuirasse et la place dessus. Vêtu uniquement de son uniforme, il semble plus petit et très fatigué.{/n} « Moi, le maréchal Gregoras Strachs, démissionne de mon poste. Je ne suis plus digne de porter cette armure. Puisse le prochain qui la portera faire honneur à la Lex. »
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯放下了手中的盾牌，脱掉了身上的盔甲，将盔甲放在了盾牌上。此时此刻，他身上仅仅穿着紧身制服。脱掉盔甲的元帅不再威风凛凛，疲态尽显。{/n}“我，格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，即刻卸任。我已经配不上这身盔甲了，愿它的新主人为帝国法典带来荣耀。”
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯放下了手中的盾牌，脱掉了身上的盔甲，将盔甲放在了盾牌上。此时此刻，他身上仅仅穿着紧身制服。脱掉盔甲的元帅不再威风凛凛，疲态尽显。{/n}“我，格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，即刻卸任。我已经配不上这身盔甲了，愿它的新主人为帝国法典带来荣耀。”
{n}斯塔克斯放下了手中的盾牌，脱掉了身上的盔甲，将盔甲放在了盾牌上。此时此刻，他身上仅仅穿着紧身制服。脱掉盔甲的元帅不再威风凛凛，疲态尽显。{/n}“格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅即刻卸任。我已经配不上这身盔甲了，愿它的新主人为帝国法典带来荣耀。”

languages.text: {n}Strachs deja su escudo, se quita el caparazón y lo coloca encima. Ataviado solo con el uniforme que lleva debajo, parece más pequeño y cansado.{/n} «Yo, Mariscal Gregoras Strachs, abandono mi cargo oficialmente. Ya no merezco llevar esta armadura. Que su nuevo portador traiga honor a la Lex».
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

Ataviado solo con el uniforme que lleva debajo, parece más pequeño y cansado.{/n} «Yo, Mariscal Gregoras Strachs, abandono mi cargo oficialmente. Ya no merezco llevar esta armadura. Que su nuevo portador traiga honor a la Lex».

{n}Strachs deja su escudo, se quita el caparazón y lo coloca encima. Ataviado solo con el uniforme que lleva debajo, parece más pequeño y cansado.{/n} «El Mariscal Gregoras Strachs queda relevado del cargo. Ya no merezco llevar esta armadura. Que su nuevo portador traiga honor a la Lex».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスは盾を置き、カラペースを取り外し、盾の上に置く。彼は、アンダースーツのユニホームのみを着て、鎧を脱いで小さくなり、とても疲れているように見える。{/n}「私、グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥は、将帥を退任します。私はもはやこの鎧を着るのにふさわしくありません。新しい着用者がレックスに名誉をもたらしますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスは盾を置き、カラペースを取り外し、盾の上に置く。彼は、アンダースーツのユニホームのみを着て、鎧を脱いで小さくなり、とても疲れているように見える。{/n}「私、グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥は、将帥を退任します。私はもはやこの鎧を着るのにふさわしくありません。新しい着用者がレックスに名誉をもたらしますように」
{n}ストラッチスは盾を置き、カラペースを取り外し、盾の上に置く。彼は、アンダースーツのユニホームのみを着て、鎧を脱いで小さくなり、とても疲れているように見える。{/n}「私、グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥は、将帥を退任します。私はもはやこの鎧を着るのにふさわしくありません。新しい着用者がレックスに名誉をもたらしますように」

languages.text: {n}Strachs; kalkanını yere bırakıyor, göğüs zırhını çıkarıyor ve kalkanın üzerine koyuyor. Artık üstünde zırhının altına giydiği tulumdan başka bir şey yok. Zırhsız daha küçük görünüyor ve hissettiği ağır yorgunluk açığa çıkıyor.{/n} "Miralay Gregoras Strachs olarak makamımı bırakıyorum. Artık bu zırhı giymeye layık değilim. Yeni sahibi Lex'i onurlandırsın."
languages.original_text: {n}Strachs sets his shield down, detaches his carapace, and places it over the shield. Now clad only in his undersuit uniform, he looks smaller without his armour, and very tired.{/n} "I, Marshal Gregoras Strachs, am stepping down from my post. I am no longer fit to wear this armour. May its new wearer bring honour to the Lex."

{n}Strachs kalkanını yere bırakıyor, göğüs zırhını çıkarıyor ve kalkanın üzerine koyuyor. Artık üstünde zırhının altına giydiği tulumdan başka bir şey yok. Zırhsız daha küçük görünüyor ve hissettiği ağır yorgunluk açığa çıkıyor.{/n} "Miralay Gregoras Strachs görevinden ayrılıyor. Artık bu zırhı giymeye layık değilim. Yeni sahibi Lex'i onurlandırsın."
